channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Amazon Laying Off 16,000 as It Increases ‘Ownership’ and Removes ‘Bureaucracy’
item.description: A blog post by the company’s head of HR hinted that more layoffs could be on the way.

item.title: La puissante Ugreen 200 W profite des soldes d’hiver pour perdre 31 % de son prix et passer sous les 90 euros
item.description: Entre sa puissance de 200 W, ses trois ports de charge ou encore ses treize protections parées à toutes les éventualités, cette batterie externe de Ugreen est un super allié pour vos voyages. Chez Amazon, elle passe de 129,99 euros à 89,99 euros pendant les soldes d'hiver.

item.title: 'The UK war on VPNs is an embarrassment' – backlash grows over proposed VPN age-checks
item.description: Critics are warning against proposals to restrict VPN access — but will the plans actually become law?

item.title: Forecast Map Reveals Which East Coast States Should Brace for More Snow This Weekend
item.description: Meteorologists are tracking another major storm system that could exacerbate lingering impacts from last weekend’s Winter Storm Fern.

item.title: ‘Star Trek’ Legend Robert Picardo on Why the ‘Starfleet Academy’ Cadets Talk Like Modern Kids
item.description: The latest episode of 'Starfleet Academy' will give its young cadets a lesson in diction from the good Doctor himself.

item.title: Les PC portables gaming et bureautiques ont jusqu’à 1 000 € de réduction pendant l’ultime démarque des soldes d’hiver
item.description: Configuration gaming, bureautique, avec carte graphique Nvidia ou non, processeur AMD, Intel ou Qualcomm, écran IPS ou OLED... Nombre de PC portables sont en promotion lors de la dernière démarque des soldes d'hiver mais seuls quelques-uns méritent vraiment de figurer dans cette sélection.

item.title: La nouvelle MG4 électrique abordable est enfin en Europe : voici les premiers chiffres
item.description: Promise de longue date, la nouvelle MG4 Urban vient d'arriver au Royaume-Uni. Cette voiture électrique venue de Chine se place sous la MG4 qu'on connaît déjà, notamment en termes de prix. La version actuelle gagne un nouvel intérieur et ne garde que ses grandes batteries.

item.title: 'You shouldn't worry as much about AI taking your job as you should worry about someone who's very good using AI taking your job': Cisco CEO says effects of AI will cause "carnage" in the jobs market
item.description: Cisco CEO says "carnage" will hit future labor markets, IMF MD likens AI to a "tsunami" that will change how we see work.

item.title: Scott Pilgrim EX will hit PC and consoles on March 3
item.description: Fans of co-op beat-‘em-ups and fictional bass players who kind of suck as human beings might want to mark March 3 on their calendars. That’s when Scott Pilgrim EX is set to hit PS4, PS5, Xbox Series X/S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch and Steam. Developer and publisher Tribute Games announced the release date in a new trailer, which also revealed two more playable characters: Matthew Patel (a member of the League of Evil Exes) and Robot-01, a creation of the Katayanagi Twins. One more fighter will be unveiled in the coming weeks. Tribute worked with Scott Pilgrim creator Bryan Lee O’Malley on an or...

item.title: Alienware 16X Aurora
item.description: Weighing under six pounds, alongside being less than an inch thick when closed, the Alienware 16X features an Intel Core Ultra 9, Nvidia GeForce RTX 5070 GPU, 32GB DDR5 RAM, and 1TB SSD. These specs are matched with a 16-inch display featuring a 2560 x 1600 resolution with a 240Hz refresh rate.

item.title: DeepMind’s New AI Can Read a Million DNA Letters at Once—and Actually Understand Them
item.description: AlphaGenome is reportedly the most comprehensive and accurate DNA sequence model developed to date.

item.title: Election Denier Tina Peters Was ‘Pardoned’ by Trump. She’s Still in Prison
item.description: Former election clerk Tina Peters is a hero to conspiracy theorists, and even received an empty “pardon” from the president. Colorado's governor has held firm against commuting her sentence—so far.

item.title: Super Bowl 2026 TV deals: The best sales ahead of kickoff
item.description: The big game is one of the few instances now in the US where most people gather around the TV to watch the live event together. While the teams playing in Super Bowl 2026 are the true stars of the show (and Bad Bunny, of course), your TV is a pretty important part of the puzzle of putting together an excellent Super Bowl party. Maybe you’ve been thinking about replacing an aging set, or you’re itching for a full refresh of your home theater setup — either way, you’ll want to try to get a good deal on a new TV. Thankfully, the weeks leading up to the Super Bowl can be a great time to shop for a...

item.title: Cette vidéo virale est bluffante… jusqu’à ce que vous découvriez ce qui s’y passe vraiment
item.description: Imaginez deux météores dont le chemin se croise juste au-dessus d’un volcan japonais. La vidéo est fascinante. Mais derrière les apparences se joue un phénomène physique inattendu.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S26 : voici à quoi ressemble le chargeur sans fil nouvelle génération pour rattraper Apple et Google
item.description: Voici des photos montrant le chargeur sans fil magnétique (Qi2) officiel que prépare Samsung pour les Galaxy S26, S26 Plus et S26 Ultra.

item.title: Données sensibles : l’Europe ne veut pas exclure les géants du Cloud américains
item.description: Un sujet autant technique que géopolitique : après des années de négociation, Bruxelles a tranché : elle n'inclut pas des critères de souveraineté dans l'EUCS, le futur label de cybersécurité européen, mais elle n'interdit pas aux 27 de le faire, pays par pays. La mesure, défendue par Paris et des défenseurs d'une souveraineté européenne, aurait empêché les leaders américains du marché du cloud (Amazon, Microsoft et Google) d'héberger nos données les plus sensibles....

item.title: One of our favorite budgeting apps is only $50 for the year for new users
item.description: A new year is the perfect time to get your spending in order, and if you're not trying to build your own spreadsheet, budgeting apps are one of the best ways to do it. To save yourself some money in the process, you can pick up a year-long subscription to Monarch Money, one of Engadget's favorite budgeting apps, for just $50 if you use code NEWYEAR2026 at checkout and you're a new subscriber. That's a 50 percent discount on the service's normal $100 price. Monarch Money makes for a capable and detailed budgeting companion. You can use the service via apps for iOS, Android, iPadOS or the web, a...

item.title: Popeyes franchisee closes 17 restaurants in bankruptcy. See the full list of doomed locations
item.description: Sailormen Inc, which recently sought Chapter 11 protection, has just shuttered more than a dozen locations of the beloved fried chicken chain. Fans of Popeyes Louisiana Kitchen will be sad to learn that more than a dozen locations have shuttered this month across two Southeastern states.

item.title: Dyson's ridiculously compact new vacuum is going to change the market forever – here's why
item.description: The PencilVac prioritizes lightness over outright power, and that's a good thing.

item.title: Volkswagen s’est fait doubler : Ford lance la nouvelle batterie LFP tant attendue avant même les ID.4
item.description: La nouvelle batterie LFP de Volkswagen arrive enfin ! Mais chez Ford en premier. Le constructeur vient de mettre à jour ses deux SUV électriques phares en Europe, l'Explorer et le Capri. De quoi faire grimper l'autonomie sans toucher au prix, et envisager l'arrivée de cette batterie dans les prochaines semaines chez Volkswagen.

item.title: Le Samsung Galaxy A37 risque de concurrencer le Galaxy S26
item.description: Deux visuels du Galaxy A37 sortent du bois. Le futur smartphone devrait être commercialisé autour de 400 euros et intègrerait une charge de 45 W.

item.title: 'Windows 11 25H2 edges ahead of Windows 10 in gaming performance': testing proves newer OS is faster — but there's an elephant-sized BSOD in the room
item.description: Think Windows 10 is faster than Windows 11 for gaming? You're dead wrong, based on a new test — but I'm betting this won't sway Windows 10 holdouts.

item.title: Samsung’s new cheap OLED TV for 2026 looks set to get a big brightness boost — but there will be a catch
item.description: LG's OLED SE screen seems to the coming to Samsung's S85H – if that's confusing, allow me to explain…

item.title: Son of Executive Overseeing U.S. Government’s Crypto Stash Accused of Stealing $40 Million
item.description: There's a big pot of digital gold out there.

item.title: Payments processing pitfalls to avoid when going cloud-first
item.description: Stability has long since been treasured in finance but now we see disruption everywhere...

item.title: Intel revient dans la course : des puces pour Nvidia et des MacBook dès 2028 ?
item.description: On pensait TSMC indétrônable et Intel relégué au second plan, mais la géopolitique et les pressions américaines rebattent les cartes. D'ici 2028, Nvidia et Apple pourraient bien confier une partie de leurs puces au géant de Santa Clara, mais pas n'importe lesquelles.

item.title: Apple Creator Studio is now available for $13 per month: What's included and what it means for creators
item.description: Services have been a huge part of Apple’s business for the past several years — to the tune of tens of billions of dollars in revenue last year alone. Now, with the new Apple Creator Studio bundle, the company is leaning harder into the professional creative software space. Apple Creator Studio packages a bunch of the company’s pro apps into a single subscription service that you can pay monthly or yearly for. It’s officially available starting January 28, and includes a one-month free trial. The key shift is that some of these apps are now subscription-only on iPad, even as Apple continues to...

item.title: Windows 10 regagne du terrain sur Windows 11, mais pourquoi ?
item.description: Un peu plus de trois mois après la fin officielle du support de Windows 10, ce dernier gagne des parts de marché au détriment de celles de Windows 11.

item.title: TechCrunch Disrupt 2026: Plus-one passes are almost gone and only 3 days remain
item.description: The TechCrunch Disrupt 2026 plus-one passes at 50% off are almost sold out, and this deal ends in 3 days. Register here before this deal ends on Friday, January 30 at 11:59 p.m. PT.

item.title: Beyond Meat’s protein soda might be its last chance and best hope
item.description: Beyond Meat just launched a new product that's even further from meat than ever before: a protein soda. Beyond Immerse is the company's first product that makes no attempt to replicate meat whatsoever, marking a sharp shift in Beyond's business model. It might seem like it comes out of left field, but it all clicks […]

item.title: The Sony WH-1000XM6 offer 'class-leading ANC' and are some of the best headphones around – and they’re back to their lowest-ever price on Amazon
item.description: The Sony WH-1000XM6 Wireless Headphones are some of the best headphones around, offering great audio performance, exceptional noise cancellation and a comfy design – and they're now back to a record-low price on Amazon.

item.title: Trump signs an order to boost reconstruction in L.A., but Gov. Newsom says it misses the mark
item.description: Los Angeles Mayor Bass said the Trump administration should speed up FEMA reimbursements for homeowners instead. President Donald Trump announced Tuesday that he has signed an executive order to “cut through bureaucratic red tape” and speed up reconstruction of tens of thousands of homes destroyed by the January 2025 Los Angeles area wildfires.Trump’s order, signed Friday, seeks to allow homeowners to rebuild without contending with “unnecessary, duplicative, or obstructive” permitting requirements, the White House said in a statement.The order directs the Federal Emergency Management Agency a...

item.title: This dangerous APT has expanded its skills with some new tools - here's what we know
item.description: Mustang Panda gave CoolClient new bells and whistles, including clipboard monitoring.

item.title: Trump’s acting cybersecurity chief uploaded sensitive government docs to ChatGPT
item.description: A report cited officials as saying that Homeland Security sought to determine if there was any harm to government security as a result of the lapse.

item.title: The AI infrastructure boom shows no sign of slowing down
item.description: ASML’s record orders show chipmakers are still betting big on AI data centers.

item.title: 1,000-Year-Old Bronze Cross Perfectly Matches Mold Found 40 Years Ago, Shocking Archaeologists
item.description: A volunteer in Germany may have linked a medieval wheel cross to a mold unearthed four decades ago.

item.title: This soft humanoid robot is designed to be ‘physically safe and socially approachable’
item.description: A startup called Fauna Robotics has revealed a new humanoid robot called Sprout it's been developing over the past two years. Standing around 3.5-feet tall, Sprout's design, featuring a soft padded exterior, a wide head, and expressive mechanical eyebrows, was inspired by some of science fiction's friendlier robots like Baymax and Rosie Jetson, the startup's […]...

item.title: Chrome pourrait ralentir le démarrage de Windows avec cette nouvelle option
item.description: Google teste une fonctionnalité inédite dans son navigateur Chrome pour PC. Si elle s'avére utile sur le papier, elle pourrait faire plus de mal que de bien.

item.title: Standard Nuclear raises $140M as nuclear power enters its gold rush era
item.description: Investors including a16z are betting that nuclear industry suppliers will be the big winners of the AI demand-driven nuclear renaissance.

item.title: LinkedIn will let you show off your vibe coding chops with a certificate
item.description: LinkedIn is partnering with Descript, Lovable, Replit, and Relay.app at launch

item.title: Xiaomi vide ses stocks avant la fin des soldes : les 17 offres à retenir
item.description: Pour la dernière semaine des soldes, il est encore possible de tomber sur de très bons deals, notamment chez Xiaomi. De nombreux de ses produits sont en promotions, et si une des dernières références de la marque vous fait de l’oeil, c’est l’occasion de profiter des nombreuses offres.

item.title: Soldes d’hiver 2026 : les 20 bons plans de la dernière démarque qui crèvent l’écran sur les téléviseurs et les vidéoprojecteurs
item.description: L'ultime démarque des soldes d'hiver vient de démarrer avec son cortège d'offres sur les téléviseurs dernier cri et les vidéoprojecteurs bardés de nouvelles technologies. Envie d'une image flambant neuve ? Voici notre sélection des meilleurs bons plans qui crèvent l'écran.

item.title: Marathon DualSense PS5 controller pre-orders build-up live — the best info and links ahead of the new hardware launching tomorrow
item.description: We've got all the best information and links for the new Marathon Limited Edition PS5 controller and Pulse Elite headset, so you can bag your new accessory with ease.

item.title: AI vs. AI: Using intelligence to solve the energy strain of data centers
item.description: The challenge is no longer just about replacing fossil fuels with renewables. It is about re-architecting entire systems to balance soaring digital demand with emissions goals.

item.title: My favorite folding phone is the one that doesn’t exist yet
item.description: A book-style folding phone is a gadget that poses one radical idea: What if you always had a computer in your pocket? When you'd like to be writing a blog while your plane is taking off, and large electronics (Computer) must be stowed? When you're sitting on the couch putting together a grocery order, and […]

item.title: The conference where founders scale: TechCrunch Founder Summit 2026 tickets are now live at the lowest prices
item.description: TechCrunch Founder Summit 2026 unites 1,100 founders and investors in Boston on June 23 for a day focused on real-world scaling insights and networking that pushes the needle. Save up to $300 on your ticket.

item.title: Après les morts de Minneapolis, Tim Cook, Sam Altman et la tech US sortent prudemment du silence
item.description: Les grands patrons de la tech très proches de Donald Trump ont fini par se rebiffer… sagement. Les événements de Minneapolis, où deux personnes sont mortes sous les coups de feu de la police de l'immigration ont fini par faire réagir plusieurs personnalités, dont Sam Altman et Tim Cook.

item.title: This fanny pack robot helped me walk miles
item.description: Oops, I did it again: I wore an exoskeleton to the world's biggest tech show, walking the streets and casinos of Las Vegas with a robot powering my legs. I don't mean I briefly tried a new gadget there. I mean that for the second year in a row, robotic legs helped me walk the […]

item.title: The Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra’s privacy display could be the biggest upgrade in a while – here’s how it works
item.description: Samsung has now detailed the long-rumored privacy display feature we're expecting to launch with the Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra.

item.title: I was suprised when I saw that this VPN was less than $3 per month, and that it includes advanced features for that price, too — here's how you can grab yours
item.description: It's much easier to keep your data safe when it barely impacts your wallet

item.title: Chip firm ASML to slash 1,700 jobs and posts record profit for 2025 thanks to AI boom
item.description: The Dutch chip machine maker reported $11.5 billion in sales for 2025. Dutch semiconductor chip machine maker ASML recorded a record net profit of 9.6 billion euros ($11.5 billion) in 2025 on sales of 32.7 billion euros fueled by AI-driven demand, the company reported Wednesday as it also announced plans to slash its workforce by about 1,700, about 4% of its workforce.The growth comes despite Dutch government restrictions on exports of machines that can be used to make chips that can be integrated into weapons systems. The measures, initially announced in 2023 and later expanded, are seen as p...

item.title: Samsung teases new privacy feature to hide your Galaxy phone screen from onlookers
item.description: Samsung said that the upcoming feature will let you protect selected parts of the screen like notification popup area.
